actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Administrative Procedure Act to require each agency to estimate and publish the projected total costs and total benefits of each new rule prior to its adoption, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Administrative Procedure Act to require Federal agencies to prepare and publish in the Federal Register an economic impact analysis of all proposed and final rules subject to the provisions of the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Administrative Procedure Act to require each agency to estimate and publish the projected total costs and total benefits of each new rule prior to its adoption, and for other purposes.
